entry.title: [Mac] 三步驟純指令建立Ubuntu的USB隨身碟
entry.content:

/dev/disk2
   #:                       TYPE NAME                    SIZE       IDENTIFIER
   0:     FDisk_partition_scheme                        *8.1 GB     disk2
